reasoning: CRMO is a rare chronic inflammatory bone disease predominantly affecting children. Estimated incidence 0.5-1 per 1,000,000 births (~0.08 per 100k person-years). Often under-diagnosed due to rarity and diagnostic complexity.
source: Jansson A et al. (2007). Chronic recurrent multifocal osteomyelitis in children: a nation-wide survey. J Rheumatol. 34(5):1122-1126
